content: What Italian explorer, sailing under the Spanish flag, completed four voyages across the Atlantic Ocean and initiated European exploration of the Americas?

The Italian explorer you're referring to is Christopher Columbus. He undertook four voyages across the Atlantic Ocean sponsored by the Spanish monarchs, King Ferdinand and Queen Isabella. His first voyage in 1492 led to the European discovery of the Americas, although he himself believed he had reached the Indies in Asia. This误认 led to the indigenous peoples of the Americas being referred to as "Indians."
